entry.title: Celtic legend takes dig at Rangers player for diving
entry.summary: After Celtic drew 1-1 against Motherwell, the Rangers were handed a major chance to get back into the title race. All they needed to do was win their games in hand and they would be just three points behind the Hoops in the league table. entry.title: Giorgio Chiellini makes superb claim about Celtic Park

entry.title: Ange Postecoglou claims Celtic success gets dismissed
